This is a testharness.js-based test.
FAIL createAnswer() with null remoteDescription should reject with InvalidStateError assert_throws: function "function () { throw e }" threw object "OperationError: CreateAnswer can't be called before SetRemoteDescription." that is not a DOMException InvalidStateError: property "code" is equal to 0, expected 11
FAIL createAnswer() after setting remote description should succeed assert_false: Expect answer to not be instance of RTCSessionDescription expected false got true
PASS createAnswer() when connection is closed reject with InvalidStateError
Harness: the test ran to completion.
